name: Wireless Bluetooth 5.0 Headphones with Active Noise Cancellation and 40-Hour Battery
description:
- Wireless Bluetooth 5.0 connectivity
- Active Noise Cancellation for immersive audio
- 40-hour battery life on a single charge
- Soft memory foam ear cups for all-day comfort
- Foldable design with travel case included
- Built-in mic for clear calls
- Touch controls for playback and volume
- Compatible with all major OS and devices
- Lightweight frame, premium materials
- Available in black, white, and blue

name: Smartwatch with AMOLED Display, GPS Tracking, and 7-Day Battery Life
description:
- High-resolution AMOLED display
- Tracks steps, sleep, heart rate, and stress
- Receives notifications, calls, and messages
- IP68 water-resistant for workouts and rain
- 7-day battery life on typical use
- Built-in GPS and activity tracking
- Custom watch faces available
- Syncs with Android and iOS
- Magnetic charging dock included
- Sleek, lightweight aluminum build

name: High-Precision Gaming Mouse with 16,000 DPI Sensor and RGB Lighting
description:
- High-precision 16,000 DPI sensor
- 6 programmable buttons for macros
- RGB lighting with multiple effects
- Ergonomic grip for long gaming sessions
- Durable braided USB cable
- Adjustable weight tuning system
- On-board memory for profiles
- Ultra-low latency performance
- Smooth glide PTFE feet
- Compatible with Windows and macOS

name: Portable Bluetooth Speaker with Deep Bass, Stereo Sound, and IPX5 Water Resistance
description:
- Deep bass and stereo sound output
- Bluetooth 5.0 with 10m range
- IPX5 water-resistant design
- 12-hour battery for non-stop music
- Built-in mic for hands-free calls
- Compact and travel-ready size
- Pair two speakers for stereo
- USB-C fast charging support
- AUX input and microSD support
- LED ring indicator for status

name: Mechanical Keyboard with Blue Switches, Per-Key RGB Lighting, and Durable Aluminum Frame
description:
- Blue switches with tactile feedback
- Per-key RGB lighting with effects
- Durable aluminum top plate
- Full anti-ghosting and N-key rollover
- USB passthrough for accessories
- Detachable braided USB-C cable
- Adjustable typing angles
- Custom macros with onboard memory
- Compatible with Windows/macOS/Linux
- Compact tenkeyless layout

name: 15.6-Inch Portable Full HD Monitor with USB-C & HDMI, Built-In Speakers, and Smart Cover
description:
- 15.6" Full HD IPS display
- Ultra-slim and lightweight body
- USB-C and HDMI connectivity
- Works with phones, laptops, and consoles
- Built-in stereo speakers
- Magnetic smart cover stand included
- Low blue light and anti-glare coating
- Plug-and-play, no drivers required
- Wide color gamut support
- Great for productivity on the go

name: Adjustable Aluminum Laptop Stand with Ventilation and Non-Slip Rubber Pads
description:
- Adjustable height and angle
- Durable aluminum alloy construction
- Non-slip rubber pads for grip
- Ventilated design for cooling
- Supports up to 17” laptops
- Folds flat for portability
- Minimalist and modern aesthetic
- Raises screen to eye level
- Helps reduce neck strain
- Easy to assemble and use

name: 1080p Full HD Webcam with Autofocus, Low-Light Correction, and Noise-Reducing Microphone
description:
- Full HD 1080p resolution
- Autofocus and low-light correction
- Built-in noise-reducing microphone
- 90° wide-angle field of view
- USB plug-and-play interface
- Works with Zoom, Teams, Skype
- Privacy shutter cover included
- 360° adjustable swivel mount
- Clip fits most monitors/laptops
- Works with Windows/macOS/Linux

name: 20000mAh High-Capacity Power Bank with Dual USB Output and Fast 18W PD Charging
description:
- High-capacity 20,000mAh battery
- Dual USB output + USB-C input/output
- Fast charge supported (18W PD)
- LED indicator for battery level
- Sleek matte finish design
- Charges 3 devices simultaneously
- Compact and airplane-safe
- Built-in surge protection
- Compatible with all phones/tablets
- Ideal for travel and emergencies

name: 15W Fast Wireless Charger Pad with Qi-Certified Safety and Non-Slip Surface
description:
- 15W fast wireless charging
- Slim and lightweight build
- Qi-certified for safety
- Non-slip rubber ring surface
- Works with cases up to 5mm
- LED status indicator
- USB-C cable included
- Safe for overnight use
- Compatible with iPhone/Samsung
- Sleek matte black finish

name: True Wireless Noise Cancelling Earbuds with Hybrid ANC and 32-Hour Battery Life
description:
- True wireless stereo (TWS)
- Hybrid active noise cancellation
- Up to 8 hours battery, 32h w/ case
- Touch control for music/calls
- Sweat and water resistant (IPX4)
- USB-C fast charging support
- Dual mic for clear calls
- Ergonomic fit with silicone tips
- Smart in-ear detection
- Case supports wireless charging

name: 5m RGB Smart Light Strip with WiFi/Bluetooth Control and Alexa/Google Assistant Compatibility
description:
- 5m RGB LED light strip
- App-controlled via WiFi/Bluetooth
- Works with Alexa and Google Assistant
- Music sync mode built-in
- Timer and scene customization
- 16 million colors and brightness
- Adhesive backing for easy install
- Cuttable and extendable design
- Energy-efficient LEDs
- Great for gaming or ambiance lighting

name: 7-in-1 USB-C Hub with 4K HDMI, USB 3.0, SD Card Reader, and 100W PD Charging
description:
- 7-in-1 hub: HDMI, USB, SD, PD
- 4K HDMI output at 30Hz
- 3 USB 3.0 ports for peripherals
- SD/microSD card reader
- USB-C PD charging up to 100W
- Aluminum shell for heat dissipation
- Plug-and-play with no drivers
- Compatible with Mac/Windows/Linux
- Compact travel-friendly size
- Ideal for laptops and tablets

name: Ergonomic Office Chair with Adjustable Lumbar Support, Mesh Backrest, and Memory Foam Seat
description:
- Adjustable lumbar support system
- Breathable mesh backrest
- Cushioned seat with memory foam
- 360° swivel and tilt mechanism
- Height and armrest adjustability
- Smooth-rolling caster wheels
- Durable steel frame base
- Great for long hours of work
- Modern design fits all setups
- Easy to assemble with instructions

name: Laptop Cooling Pad with 5 High-Speed Fans, Adjustable Angles, and Quiet LED Operation
description:
- 5 high-speed cooling fans
- Adjustable height and tilt angles
- Quiet operation with LED lights
- USB-powered with passthrough port
- Supports laptops up to 17”
- Anti-slip surface and feet
- Helps improve performance and life
- Great for gaming and heavy usage
- Durable plastic and metal build
- Lightweight and easy to carry
